about: Magallanes is one of the earliest subdivisions established in Makati by the Ayala family. Magallanes was established and founded in 1965 (1960 by Mayor Maximo Estrella) even during the time when Makati was still part of the province of Rizal. First settlers of the Barangay were the affluent families from Singalong, Binondo, etc. and Ambassadors and Consuls of several Foreign Embassies. Residents of the Barangay are varied: businessmen, management employees, professionals (doctors,lawyers, architects, engineers, etc.), students and household staff. The community developed from a residential to a highly developed mixed economy which includes restaurants, groceries, business offices, schools, industrial and retail stores, utilities and shopping buildings and malls.
mission: To deliver to its constituents all the services necessary in order to meet its yearly objectives and directives. To sustain good governance as a standard of service and develop a proactive citizenry with the use of the latest technology and in cooperation with the City Government. To play a major role in the success of the City Government by aligning all its services to attainment of true sustainability in all aspects of modern life.
vision: Barangay Magallanes envisions itself to be a community that is united and not divided with a sense of belonging, togetherness and cooperation. To be a vibrant, progressive and participatory community.

feast_day.title: Feast of St.Alphonsus, Patron Saint of the Barangay
